channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blue recycling bins filled with garden and builders waste, 1st December
item.description:
Around 3 out of 6 blue recycling bins inside Kapuvar Close have been filled with garden waste and builders waste and are now very full and heavy. This has happened within the past few days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7C, Choumert Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Harlinger Street, Woolwich

item.title: As last year all the Christmas lights works apart fro the one opposite my flat (outside Zizzis 157 High St Beckenham, 1st December
item.description:
The Christmas lights don’t come on … It’s such a short time that the lights are up so please can it be sorted asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 212-214, High Street, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bins overflowing for months, 1st December
item.description:
I live on this street and this particular property/properties bins are attracting vermin, foxes and they smell bad, not to mention looking horrific. There are often used condoms, disgusting items left on the pavement. The bins are never emptied because they are used incorrectly but it is getting to the point where sometimes people can’t walk past it. Lease found they be emptied? Or even removed? The whole end of the road suffers because of these properties and bins. These pictures don’t fully show the disgusting mess.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combedale Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead medium sized fox, 1st December
item.description:
Dead fox in the middle of the right lane (as going down the hill) Danger to drivers in the dark and animal cruelty to have cars driving over its body
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Knee Hill, Abbey Wood

item.title: Abandoned car, 1st December
item.description:

item.title: No 12-to permit holder signs, 1st December
item.description:
Council have taken all the parking away on one side of station road and sold to ringo. on the other side there is supposed to be signs saying parking only permitted 12-2 for permit holders. these signs have never been put up. cars using train station have taken up all the parking spaces by 9a for the entire day so residents and resident guests cannot use. please put up permit signs ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queen's Mead Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No open toilets in park except for the Stables which is not suitable for dog walkers. In fact the toilet facilities are awful.rs., 1st December
item.description:
The toilets near the house have been shut for weeks and the toilets in the play area were shut as well. This is a big issue for many people including dog walkers and disabled. When they are open they are often in a bad state. I
